name: JV Enterprises
overview:
Incorporated in the year 1989, at Ludhiana (Punjab, India), we, “J.V. Enterprises (India),” are reckoned amongst the remarkable enterprises devotedly engaged in manufacturing and supplying a qualitative assortment of Electroplating Equipments, Plating Plant, Electroplating Barrel and Effluent Treatment Plant etc.

Infrastructure: Our well-renowned organization has a broad infrastructural unit that is properly installed with the contemporary machines and technology. Manned and supervised by our adroit professionals who are highly qualified in their respective field, this unit is separated into various departments to manufacture the entire range as per the industry standards.

Our Quality Assurance: As a quality oriented company, we have recruited an experienced team of quality controllers to test our products. These professionals ensure that the quality of our products is in complete tandem with the norms and standards prevailing in industry.

Our Team: Technocrats Engineer Quality Analyst Marketing professional Sales executive

Why Us?: With immense pleasure, we are introducing ourselves the prominent manufacturer and supplier of extensive quality range of Electroplating Equipments, Plating Plant, Electroplating Barrel and Effluent Treatment Plant etc. We have continuously gained appreciation from our clients for our quality assured products and on time delivery.
